rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学研究人员使用新的剂量技术来增强 ICU 抗生素治疗昆士兰大学的研究人员使用剂量软件来加速抗生素对重症监护室脓毒症患者的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/UQ-researchers-use-new-dosing-technology-to-enhance-ICU-antibiotic-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/UQ-researchers-use-new-dosing-technology-to-enhance-ICU-antibiotic-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4972379f-92b9-445a-b588-074ae4291fc2 Sun, 24 Mar 2024 06:09:00 -0400 UQ researchers use new dosing technology to enhance ICU antibiotic treatment
突破性研究发现常见细菌与胃癌之间的联系一项新的研究发现，体内常见的一种细菌通常不会对健康人造成问题，但却在导致胃癌（世界上第五大常见癌症）方面发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/Groundwriting-study-finds-link- Between-common-bacteria-and-stomach-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/Groundwriting-study-finds-link- Between-common-bacteria-and-stomach-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d2885a8-bbda-4180-9c46-c729c5b66600 Sun, 24 Mar 2024 05:59:00 -0400 Groundbreaking study finds link between common bacteria and stomach cancer
bioXcelerate 推出突破性人工智能工具以加快药物发现速度Optima Partners Limited 旗下全新创新健康数据科学部门 bioXcelerate 发布了一款新的突破性人工智能工具，该工具将加速新药的识别和开发过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/bioXcelerate-launches-breakthrough-AI-tool-for-faster-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/bioXcelerate-launches-breakthrough-AI-tool-for-faster-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdd8eca6-853b-4bbd-a1a3-1fd40797627f Sun, 24 Mar 2024 05:53:00 -0400 bioXcelerate launches breakthrough AI tool for faster drug discovery
Quibim 推出 QP-Liver，通过 MRI 分析增强肝病诊断Quibim 是一家致力于精准医学成像生物标志物的全球公司，今天宣布推出一款新产品 QP-Liver，该产品通过 MRI 扫描对组织脂肪和铁进行高精度定量，改善弥漫性肝病的诊断。它已分别获得欧盟和英国的 CE 和 UKCA 标志，这意味着它可以在这些市场上使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/Quibim-introduces-QP-Liver-for-enhancing-liver-disease-diagnosis-through-MRI-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240324/Quibim-introduces-QP-Liver-for-enhancing-liver-disease-diagnosis-through-MRI-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c31b3378-2e11-4fdf-acf3-370a57ba05cb Sun, 24 Mar 2024 05:50:00 -0400 Quibim introduces QP-Liver for enhancing liver disease diagnosis through MRI analysis
瑞典出血热病毒向南部蔓延与银行田鼠有关研究人员发现，瑞典南部斯科讷的银行田鼠携带一种可引起人类出血热的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Southern-expansion-of-hemorrhagic-fever-virus-in-Sweden-linked-to-bank-voles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Southern-expansion-of-hemorrhagic-fever-virus-in-Sweden-linked-to-bank-voles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714fa8ac-28f4-4843-b7de-b446b742709d Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Southern expansion of hemorrhagic fever virus in Sweden linked to bank voles
结核病的新分类旨在提高对疾病早期阶段的关注伦敦大学学院研究人员组成的国际团队提出了一种新的结核病 (TB) 分类方法，旨在提高对疾病早期阶段的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-classification-of-tuberculosis-aims-to-improve-focus-on-the-early-stages-of-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-classification-of-tuberculosis-aims-to-improve-focus-on-the-early-stages-of-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d688ce03-7d81-4a21-9c01-80f54017a8b0 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:34:57 -0400 New classification of tuberculosis aims to improve focus on the early stages of disease
增强产生丁酸的肠道细菌可降低感染住院率一项针对两个大型欧洲患者队列的研究发现，在两个大型国家队列中，患者肠道中产生丁酸的细菌每增加 10%，因任何感染而住院的风险就会下降 14% 至 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-butyrate-having-gut-bacteria-lowers-hospitalization-rates-for-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-butyrate-having-gut-bacteria-lowers-hospitalization-rates-for-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cca63e82-692a-49a8-a536-53bd874b70b4 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:30:08 -0400 Boosting butyrate-producing gut bacteria lowers hospitalization rates for infections
研究评估了替泽帕肽在患有 1 型糖尿病的超重/肥胖成人中的使用同行评审期刊《糖尿病技术与治疗》(DTT) 上的一项新研究评估了替西帕肽在患有 1 型糖尿病的超重/肥胖成人中的使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-evaluates-the-use-of-tirzepatide-in-overweightobese-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-evaluates-the-use-of-tirzepatide-in-overweightobese-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=379e9cc0-ccdd-4401-b3ca-fee90dd8af61 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:27:04 -0400 Study evaluates the use of tirzepatide in overweight/obese adults with type 1 diabetes
通过类胚模型解开早期人类发育之谜这是生命中最具决定性的时刻之一——胚胎发育中的关键一步，此时一个模糊的细胞球重新排列成有序的三层结构，为所有的未来奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Unlocking-the-mysteries-of-early- human-development-through-blastoid-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Unlocking-the-mysteries-of-early- human-development-through-blastoid-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74929597-7a38-4485-a92b-8b1fb0afc40f Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:20:25 -0400 Unlocking the mysteries of early human development through blastoid models
阿尔茨海默氏症夫妇的相互关怀可增强双方的福祉在患有阿尔茨海默氏病的情况下，配偶通常承担照顾者的角色。加州大学戴维斯分校领导的研究表明，患者也可以支持他们的看护者，而且互惠互利的护理是互惠互利的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Reciprocated-care-in-Alzheimers- Couples-enhances-mutual-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Reciprocated-care-in-Alzheimers- Couples-enhances-mutual-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56da443c-8b0a-42de-b73b-1662b064109b Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:14:30 -0400 Reciprocated care in Alzheimer's couples enhances mutual well-being
